question: IS Universidad de Oriente part of the same public university system as California State University, Dominguez Hills?
llm_answer:
No, Universidad de Oriente is not part of the same public university system as California State University, Dominguez Hills. 

The Universidad de Oriente is a university located in Venezuela, and it was founded in 1958. 

California State University, Dominguez Hills, on the other hand, is a public university in California, and it was founded in 1960. It is part of the California State University (CSU) system.
